text: Euphorbia alluaudii is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests, subtropical or tropical dry shrubland, and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Flora of Madagascar alluaudii Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia alluaudii
